info.name: Kehadiran Rekap API
info.description:
Postman collection for the /rekap API endpoint (run rekap pipeline and return laporan).
Note: the API reads remote DB or SSH credentials from environment variables or a .env file; requests only need instansi, month and year unless you want to override credentials.

request.description: Direct DB mode: you can set REMOTE_DATABASE_URL in the server environment or .env so the request body only needs instansi/month/year. You may still include remote_url here to override the environment for testing.

SSH mode: configure SSH_HOST, SSH_USER, SSH_PASSWORD and DB_* vars in the server environment or .env. The request body only needs instansi/month/year unless you want to override credentials here for testing.
Call rekap using values from local .env and the helper script; this request assumes the API will read credentials from environment/.env. Keep request bodies minimal (instansi/month/year).
